Hi! I've tried to recreate the beautifull Gee Bee:

STOCK

http://www./view/2qx96rr7lrqusaa/Gee%20Bee.craft

Javascript is disabled. View full album

FIRESPITTER (needs firespitter mod)

-this is the FIRESPITTER version only requires firespitter mod:

http://www./view/2qx96rr7lrqusaa/Gee%20Bee.craft

Javascript is disabled. View full album

HYBRID (needs firespitter mod)

-this is an hybrid configuration, best speed at sea level and can reach over 18 g force (yes i'm not joking 18 gee), this is really an acrobatic vehicle:

http://www./view/4k70fmtz3t47uo9/Gee%20Bee%20jetandpistons%20mk1.craft

NOTE THE GEE FORCE ON THE LAST SCREEN

Javascript is disabled. View full album
I like how you di the front of the plane. thumbs up

I like how you di the front of the plane. thumbs up

Ty! i've spended 3 hours to understand how to make a realistic gee bee front, from the external view seems a simply craft, but if u look better is a bit complicated, especially for clipping the firespitter engine and make it work with fuel.
